metaTags.title: Kurumim: Garatéa-E's next generation|| Zenith EESC
metaTags.description: Our educational project to promote curiosity and STEM in basic education groups through the contact with space.

kurumimCard1.title: Kurumim 2021
text: */Kurmin/* is an expansion of the */Garatéa-E/* project, keeping its compromise with the */promotion of education and STEM/* in basic education.
We aim to encourage the development of scientific experiments made by studants of all */Latin America/* through the analysis of results obtained when the experiment is exposed to stress environments.

Keeping the */global pandemic/* in mind, in this year's edition - 2021 - the environment conditions that were before experienced through the Atmospheric Probes flights, must be */simulated by the students/*.

kurumimCard2.title: Guardians of the Amazon
text: This year, celebrating the */Amazônia-1/* launch, the first 100% brazilian satellite, conceived for monitoring of the Amazon Rainforest, the project's theme will be: */Guardians of the Amazon/*.
The participants are encouraged to develop projects with the following primary goal: */the preservation of the Amazon's fauna and flora/*.
It is not mandatory that your project fits the theme, but projects that do will be able to participate in specific categories of our Competition.

kurumimCard3.title: Aerospace Saturday
text: */Aerospace Saturday/* is a project that aims to promote aerospace focused science for everyone.
The event has lectures, interactive activies and presentations by multiple groups. In */2021/*, Aerospace Saturday will be */100% online/* and, as always, completely */free/*.
In this day of */science celebration/* we will also announce the */award winners/* in the */Kurumin Competition/*'s categories.

kurumimCard4.title: Looking forward to participating?
detail: The */Public Notice for Kurumim 2021/* is now live and you can register until July 20th. Be sure to read the announcement for all the information on how to apply and more details on the development of the experiments.
